mapper.select:
select
from pos_check_items where 1=1
and citm_chks_id in
(null)
#{chksId}

select citm_chks_id as chksId,sum(citm_round_total) as itemTotal,sum(citm_pre_disc+citm_post_disc+citm_mid_disc) as checkItemDiscountTotal from pos_check_items where 1=1
and citm_chks_id in
(null)
#{chksId}
group by citm_chks_id
